title: Developer Community Fest Lima 2017
description: Uno de los eventos más grandes de tecnologia en Perú con el apoyo de las mas grandes comunidades tech
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
subscribeNote: No spam, solo las ultimas noticias en tecnologia!
ticketsDetails: Las entradas son gratis, previo registro.
socialMotto: Nos puedes seguir en nuestras redes sociales :
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: Ubicado en la cuadra 23 de la avenida Primavera, el campus Monterrico de la UPC nos acoje en este 25 de Noviembre
locationAddress: Prolongación Primavera 2390, Monterrico, Santiago de Surco, Lima, Perú
aboutOrganizers: GDG Lima con el apoyo de grandes comunidades de tecnología, GDG Lima es el organizador de esta edición del Dev Community Fest
aboutGdg: Google Developers Group (GDG) - es una comunidad geek de voluntarios que crean y comparten emocionantes experiencias sobre las tecnologias de Google
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Lviv](http://lviv.gdg.org.ua/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Ukrainian audience to boost development of IT.
